item.title: A Fresh Start
item.description: Alright, let’s do this one more time. Hello! I’m Kieran, and this is my blog. I had a blog before, hosted on this same domain, but I decided to start fresh. I’ve learned a lot since I started that blog, and I wanted to start anew with a fresh perspective. So, here we are. Let’s talk about what you can expect from this blog. What to Expect Firstly, I’m going to be writing about a lot of different things.
